mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CT_EVENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT EVENT_NO eventNo , EVENT_TITLE eventTitle , START_DATE startDate , END_DATE endDate , FILE_PATH filePath , ORIGIN_NAME originName , CHANGE_NAME changeName FROM CT_EVENT JOIN CT_EVENT_ATTACHMENT ON (REF_BNO = EVENT_NO) WHERE CT_EVENT.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY EVENT_NO DESC
